text: 4.18 Kis 29.18, Ese 20.41, 2 Ko 9.12, Epe 5.2, Plp 2.25, Hib 13.16 Pen bɨ nɨbi Epaploditus nop tap ñem, dapɨl yɨp ñek nɨm, mɨdtep gɨpin. Tap yad anɨb okok, mɨñɨl kuŋay yɨbɨl mɨdeb. Yɨp tap olap ma tek dup. Mel. Pen tap yɨp ñebɨm anɨb ak, God nop tap kuy tep owep dagɨl ñebɨm tek ak gɨpɨm. God ne tap dagɨl ñeb anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, tap teplep nɨgek nop tep yɨbɨl gup.
